name: Project Slime
description:
Project Slime is a acarde game on the theme of  growing in 2d.

As the player, you play a slime ball who can transform on a big ball for destroy wood obstacle and on a small ball for pass by narrow passages.

This game is a student project make in  one week, i hope you will enjoy it 

PC Controls

Q and D - Move 

Z and S - grown up or grown down
